content: I'm planning to participate in a cycling event next month and I'm looking for some advice on how to pace myself during the ride. I've been doing some longer bike rides recently, including a 30-mile ride on April 17th, which was part of a local cycling club's weekly ride series. The ride was mostly flat, and we had a nice tailwind, so I was able to average 18 miles per hour, which was a pleasant surprise.
